tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE malware_tracking ( malware_id INT PRIMARY KEY, malware_name VARCHAR(255), infected_device_id INT, date_detected TIMESTAMP )

CREATE TABLE InfectedDevices (
   device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   device_type VARCHAR(50),
   infection_date DATE,
   last_scan_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InfectionHistory (
   infection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   malware_id INT,
   device_id INT,
   infection_date DATE,
   containment_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES Malware(malware_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES InfectedDevices(device_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Malware (malware_id INT PRIMARY KEY, malware_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, malware_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, propagation_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE InfectedDevices (device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, device_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, infection_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE MalwarePropagation (propagation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, malware_id INT NOT NULL, device_id INT NOT NULL, propagation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE DeviceStatus (status_id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_id INT NOT NULL, current_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, last_checked TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE infected_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    infection_date DATE,
    last_communication DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE malware_devices (
    malware_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (malware_id, device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES malware_propagation(malware_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES infected_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE containment_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    containment_date DATE,
    action_taken VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES malware_propagation(malware_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES infected_devices(device_id)
);
